borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Variation of the Unilateral Deed of Undertaking attached to planning permission ref: 2022/01346/FR3 dated 9 February 2023 to change 22 market housing units to 22 discounted market housing units (offering a minimum 30 percent discount below open market value). Proposals also seek to amend the following notice periods; Schedule 3 (Affordable Housing) paragraph 1.4 to change the 6 months notice period from practical completion of the shared ownership units to 3 months; paragraphs 4.5 and 6.3 to change the 9 months notice period from practical completion of London Affordable Rent and Social Rent units to 3 months; and Schedule 4 (Wheelchair Units) change definition of Marketing Period from 12 months to 3 months plus paragraph 1.3 change 12 months notice to 3 months notice.
site_name: Land At The Former Hartopp Point And Lannoy PointAintree EstatePellant RoadLondonSW6 7NG
